job description:
Broadridge Access Data is looking for a skilled Data Analyst to help support the FundFile data source.
Data Analyst FundFile
In today's highly competitive financial environment, the financial services industry is faced with significant challenges including -- client retention, transparency, operational efficiency, regulatory change, and emerging digital strategies. Accessing the most up-to-date information is therefore crucial to the success and development of this industry. AccessData, a Broadridge company, offers data-driven solutions on a leading-edge platform to mutual fund manufacturers and distributors to manage those challenges in order to drive business growth maximize operational efficiencies and manage risk.
Broadridge Access Data is looking for a skilled Data Analyst to help support the FundFile data source.
General Responsibilities:
  • Work with member's data providers to collect monthly files.
  • Work with FundFile data team to add / remove funds, companies and to apply any data changes requested by the SalesWatch members.
  • Upload members formatted processed macro files into Phoenix Data Input database.
  • Carry out basic monthly data checks.
  • Support FundFile and SalesWatch operations for implementing client projects.
  • Work collaboratively with all data providers to ensure the quality and timeliness of their contributions.
  • Work with SalesWatch product director to ensure data is accurate and timely and product and operations is evolving in conjunction with the FundFile and SalesWatch product roadmap.
Requirements:

Key competencies:
  • University educated
  • Good numerical skills and attention to detail
  • Able to work against deadlines
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Ability to combine information from various sources
  • Excel, Word, PowerPoint,
Benefits:
  • Private healthcare
  • Life Insurance
  • MultiSport card
  • Fruit Day
